# Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA)

```{r read_data}
library(topicmodels)
data("AssociatedPress")
AssociatedPress
```

```{r define_lda}
lda = LDA(AssociatedPress, k=2, control = list(seed=1234))
# k = 2 means that we want to categorize our dataset into two topics
lda
```
